Share.d: YTDL is tasker+termux project to download YouTube videos on android very easily and seamlessly.

Action.Str: Download timed out for some reason.
Media download failed. Try to retry download, or check your network connection.

Action.Str: Download mode for individual video downloads?

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
You can re-run this anytime if you want to change setting.
Usage :
Method 1: Share YouTube video, playlist, channel link, or in fact any YouTube link to termux app.
Method 2: Just copy any YouTube link (This will work only on <=android 9 users, or >=android 10 users with tasker having WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. Visit Tasker website to learn how to grant it.)
Individual video download preferences Default resolution: %Prefferedreso_ytdl Download mode: %Mode_ytdl
Playlist download preferences Default resolution: Ask Download mode: Ask
Output Directory : %Directory_ytdl

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was retrieved from the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: Set the download folder for ytdl videos.
Press back button when in desired folder to select it.

Action.Str: Preferred resolution for individual video downloads.
Auto-Resolution: Set a default resolution for individual video downloads. Ask: Ask resolution before downloading.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%ld_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%ld_selected Selected </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%ld_selected_index Selected Index </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%ld_long Long true if item was long clicked, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3></StringArray>

Action.label: Regex here will match files in the Video download directory for files ending with for example .part, .f22.mp4, which are temporary files that YouTube-dl produces and normally deletes them after video is completed. But sometime, like if you force close video download these temp files might remain. This task will easily clean those files.

Action.Str: There was an error retrieving video information. Error: Couldn't connect to Internet Link: %returnurl
There was an error retrieving video information. Error: Couldn't connect to Internet Link: %returnurl
Getting link info, download will start shortly.

Action.Str: This will kill Termux app, and any other ytdl downloads going on will also be terminated.

Action.label:
This regex removes the -videoid-extension at end. For example if a line is
Video title blah blah-Pe8K2gjw8s1.mp4 it will match -Pe8K2gjw8s1.mp4
